sentences.english: The paper studies the principle of homochromous beam grating scanning.
sentences.chinese: 着重分析了單色光束的光柵掃描理論。

sentences.english: Tricolor can form all types of color by combination.
sentences.chinese: 三原色可以複合成各種色光。

sentences.english: After passing through aperture on a plate, the monochromatic light is separated into three parallel beams at different depths.
sentences.chinese: 通過孔板後的單色光被分成三個不同高度的平行光束。
並非每種色光都會反射回來。

sentences.english: Factors affecting the tone during production of lead chrome yellow pigments were stated.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了鉛鉻黃顏料在生產過程中影響色光的諸因素。

sentences.english: Image produced by combining and coloring optical and x-ray data.
sentences.chinese: 組合和着色光和X射線數據而產生的圖像。

sentences.english: Design of the wave plate for polychromatic light.
sentences.chinese: 用於多色光的波片的設計。

sentences.english: Frequency modulation is not possible with polychromatic light .
sentences.chinese: 多色光不可能調製頻率。

sentences.english: The light is dispersed into its component wave lengths.
sentences.chinese: 光被色散成各種波長的單色光。

definition: red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, violet/Colors of the rainbow
pinyin: hong2 cheng2 huang2 lu:4 lan2 dian4 zi3

definition: a glimmer/twinkling (of stars, phosphorescence, candlelight)/flickering light
Taiwan variant of 熒光|荧光[ying2 guang1]
